Context: The Social Service Worker (Accelerated) (C135) program is offered online. Interested individuals can attend online information sessions to learn about the program content and career options upon graduation. The sessions are conducted by the Social Service Worker Program Co-ordinators, who can be contacted at sswcoordinators@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-2000, ext. 2185 or communityservices@georgebrown.ca. A previously recorded session is also available for viewing. Prospective students can sign up to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more by clicking "Sign Up Now." The contact number for general inquiries is 415-415-2000, and TTY is 1-877-515-5559. For further assistance, students can email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. George Brown College's website information is subject to change without notice. Prospective students are responsible for verifying the college fees. The program coordinators' emails and contact number are: sswcoordinators@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-2000, ext. 2185, or communityservices@georgebrown.ca.
